divs: sighting detailsi remember this i worked for the dot and 495 and southhaven park was part of my turf. i saw a machine i never ever saw in my life it had a hydrolic arm that grabed the tree another hydrolic arm had a saw that cut the tree at ground level and the arm that grabed the tree would feed it into a chipper all one unit machine, it cut a path about 3 lanes... wide right into the park in no time . remember this is protected land haha yeah right. i saw this happening and was like what the [cms\tg\pd] is this.... they made a tempary bridge over the river somthing like the arm would do. the ufo they took out of the park was huge and intact it took off the top of the trees when it crashed. and they took it down the lie 495 at night time closed down the highway to a grumans hanger in riverhead. the men in black treatened the yapank firemen that responded and a few people that lived in the area that saw it, that if they opened there mouths them and there love ones will pay the price !!!! this never happened http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=pmemg33vzqq
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Shirley
There were no other sightings in Shirley on or around November 17th 1992
